 wrote:
> 
> Hi
> I have limited hard disk size total 60 GB. (30 GB in each=
 drive.)
> I=A0 want to extract the web Graph(link stuctures) to compute pa=
gerank.
> Any suggestion !!

My suggestion: do not delete information from =
a running Heritrix crawl
which is in use by Heritrix. For instance: do not =
delete files in
scratch or state.job.

You might be able to get away with m=
oving or emptying the files in
logs/, since I think Heritrix will just appe=
nd to them.

You can remove finished ARC files (which do not end in .open).=
 But if
you are not interested in this data in the first place I would advi=
se
that you research how to avoid writing ARC files in the first place.

be=
st,
Erik Hetzner
